tool_description: Ayfie Document Converter is an online document converter that supports 550+ file formats (such as PDF, XLSX, DOCX, TIF or TXT). You can drag and drop your files directly in the portal here or using the API to have the converter integrated in your app.
name: Converter
title: Converter

api_list.name: /api/converter/1/FileConverter/Convert

utterances.utterance: Convert my PDF document to another format.
I need to change this DOCX file to a different format.
Can you convert this XLSX spreadsheet for me?
Please convert this TIF image to another format.
I want to convert this TXT file to a different format.
Can you help me convert this JPEG photo?
Convert this PNG image to another format, please.
I need to convert this HTML document.
Please convert this RTF file for me.
Can you convert this ODT document to another format?
